description_for_human: Explore the latest movies by release date or genre and view their runtime.
description_for_model:
Get movies by title or genre

###
- ALWAYS group movies by genre

Example:
Documentary
[Washed Ashore](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0109128/) (86 minutes)
[Land of Nairi](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0361130/) (67 minutes)
Sci-Fi, Thriller
[Death Ray on Coral Island](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0347992/)
###
